law.catch_line: Nothing in § 21-220 or § 21-221 of this subtitle relieves any person from any requirement imposed ...
law.text: Nothing in § 21-220 or § 21-221 of this subtitle relieves any person from any requirement imposed by law with respect to any drug that is classified as a controlled dangerous substance within the meaning of Title 5 of the Criminal Law Article or the applicable federal law.
